topics.body:
I am quite bored.
Decided that, since it has been years since I studied Econ, I should go over my old notes about how Keynes sucks.
I had forgotten Britain recovered from the Depression faster than anyone by not practicing Keynesianism.

Although one shouldn't be mean to Keynes himself, he wasn't a listless spender and would have been appalled at how his ideas are misused.

But anyway I am rambling. 

The Econ studying as one can imagine doesnt quite allegiate boredom on its own, so I was hoping to try anime some more.
I have a list of mecha from Trashboat but was also hoping for anime which fulfills this single-most important requirement that cuts right to the heart of the matter: [spoiler] has hot girls[/spoiler].
Any suggestions?
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f
